item.title: How Azure CLI Manages Your Access Tokens
item.description: Azure has several tools available to create and manage cloud resources. The Azure command-line interface (CLI) is probably the second most-used tool after the web portal. The CLI runs on any platform and covers a wide variety of actions. Here is a command to create a new Virtual Machine:
